title: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding.
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart when the key is left blank.
EB: In the properties file, even if the key is left blank, it should still have a valid value. The expected result is that the externalized text can be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Observe that the externalized text is not displayed.
